page.title: 09HUXHAM BARTON FARM
page.content: There has been a settlement on the site since the Bronze Age. Mr Yendell has lived there since 1952, also the history of the house is quite interesting.A typical day on the farm: Mr Yendell gets up at seven and gets two cups of coffee, one for Mrs Yendell and one for himself. Then he goes outside and feeds the cows and checks on things. After that he goes out to the drive and says goodbye to his children who are going to school. When Mrs Yendell comes home Mr Yendell has breakfast with her,then Mr Yendell goes out to do the silage making,while Mrs Yendell does the hens and things. At dinner time he comes into the kitchen and they both have cheese and biscuits and bread.
